story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_0400_10:
The connection and bond you have with one
another! Please, show me more!
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I once only believed in my own strength! That’s all
I could believe in!
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_0800_10:
But the Trainers that are here with me now
changed me!
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_1000_10:
And that shine just now... We weren’t capable of
anything like that in the past!
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I once let my fixation on power get the best of
me, and that’s why...
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I want to steer Pasio and the power of sync stones
in a better direction!
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Please believe in me and the other sync pairs on
this island!
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_2100_10:
I probably couldn’t have taken that attack just now
on my own...
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_2200_10:
You see, there’s only so much you can do
by yourself.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Instead of moving forward alone... If we all forge
onward together, we can accomplish so
much more!
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_2400_10: To become strong with everyone from Galar...
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I want you to be a part of that, too,
Chairman Rose.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_2800_10: There are still a lot of mysteries to sync stones...
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_2900_10: We need your help for our own sake, too.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_3000_10:
We can research using sync stones for energy
and open up new possibilities while still
acknowledging the power of the human heart.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_3100_10:
In the end, don’t you think that’s most efficient
for both of us?
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_3300_10: I accept defeat for this battle.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Your sync stones’ shine is proof of the strength
of connections...
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_3600_10: You’re right. I couldn’t shine like that on my own.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_3700_10:
It seems there are many on this island who are
more capable of things like that than I am.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Sync stones are rooted in the power of the
human heart.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_3900_10:
So approaching them scientifically isn’t enough.
I understand that now.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_4000_10:
I see it’s also necessary for sync pairs to have a
place like this—somewhere they can compete with
each other freely.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_4300_10:
Monopolizing sync stones and managing them
myself isn’t the best way of doing things.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_4500_10: From now on, let’s research sync stones together.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_4600_10:
As great business partners, and in all manner
of ways.
story_galar_02_14000/2401_1001_4700_10: Yeah, I’m looking forward to it.
